data.message:
Hitler, Justin Bieber & Eminem Went to hell. They meet the Devil sitting on his throne, he asks them why they're in hell. 

Hitler says . I killed 20 million poeple & caused a holocaust on the Jewish population. 

Devil says . Good, good. Sit to my right. 

Bieber says . I poisned the world of music with my little ***** voice that irritates every normal person in the world. 

Devil says . You're such a asshole. Well done, sit to my left. 

*Looks at Eminem* 

& why are you here? 

Eminem looks at the devil and says : Get off my throne Bitch
